title: Indonesia - Batavia Arrack 48%
discription: Batavia Arrack (rum) is produced on the island of Java and then shipped to Amsterdam to be blended and aged

title: Mexico - Pixan 8 Años 40%
discription: Pixan 8 Años is crafted in Monterrey, Mexico at a distillery founded by three friends

title: Brazil - Santos Dumont XO 40%
discription: Santos Dumont XO is from the nation of Brazil and named after an aviation pioneer

title: Mauritius - Chamarel VSOP 41%
discription: Chamarel VSOP is from the island nation of Mauritius off the coast of Africa

title: Guyana - Pusser's Rum Gunpowder Proof 54.5%
discription: Pusser's Rum Gunpowder Proof is a navy strength rum from the country of Guyana

title: Peru - Ron Millonario 10 Anniversario Reserva 40%
discription: Ron Millonario 10 Anniversario Reserva is from Peru and it is like sweet orange candy

title: Barbados - Mount Gay XO Reserve 43%
discription: The very first rum in the 24 Days of Rum advent calendar
